about_the_game:
A set of items that was included as the pre-order bonus of SD GUNDAM BATTLE ALLIANCE.

Includes:
SD Gundam World Sangoku Soketsuden Pack
- Unit Liu Bei Unicorn Gundam
- Unit Sun Jian Gundam Astray
- Unit Cao Cao Wing Gundam

MS Development Aid: Start Dash Pack and Early Unlock: Gundam
- 5,000 CAPITAL tickets
- Expansion Part: Char Aznable’s Mask (for Infighters, All-Rounders, and Sharpshooters)
- Early unlock rights for the unit Gundam.
*The unit Gundam can also be obtained by progressing through the game. Early Unlock enables the unit to be used from the start of the game.
detailed_description:
A set of items that was included as the pre-order bonus of SD GUNDAM BATTLE ALLIANCE.

Includes:

MS Development Aid: Start Dash Pack and Early Unlock: Gundam
- 5,000 CAPITAL tickets
- Expansion Part: Char Aznable’s Mask (for Infighters, All-Rounders, and Sharpshooters)
- Early unlock rights for the unit Gundam.
*The unit Gundam can also be obtained by progressing through the game. Early Unlock enables the unit to be used from the start of the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6300 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2080, 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
